post.text: California, stay in line! It's the last day to early vote for Hillary. Have a question at the polls? Call 1-844-IM4-HILL.

replies.author: Ronnie
replies.text: Kendra Renee Hall you must be talking about Trump you hit that one on the nose the man will be a disaster for America and Trump Foundation is being investigated lots of shady things going on there

replies.author: Jacob
replies.text: The low information liberals need to talk to someone from Haiti. They will tell you about CLINTON love....There is none. The Clinton's collected millions to rebuild Haiti. Instead HILLARY and BILL STOLE THAT MONEY FOR THEMSELVES! Liberals pretend they care so much about the poor but vote for a thief of charity funds....A thief does not get anymore low than that.

replies.author: Ronnie
replies.text: You must be talking about Trump a big crook that ripped off 5,000 students in United States hard working people Trump didn't care that's why he has a federal court case pending for fraud and racketeering charges the man also has 3500 lawsuits Trump is a mess. #NEVERTRUMP
